title: Dan Soder, Middle School, and The Civil War
description:
Shane Dawson is still canceled but hat-tip for the "getting engaged to distract from having sex with a cat" move. New segment "The Office" where we get random topics, this week from Glenny Balls, YP, and Office Manager Brett. Dan Soder (49:28) returns to talk about hating himself, how comedy is like learning to dunk, why people with traumatic childhoods give the best head, how he hates his own jokes, Louis CK, Bill Cosby, andÂ why Russians are the scariest white people. Voicemails include: knife, fork or spoon, just do anal, liking every post


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
